# News comment title:
Schumer Scolds Connecting Boston to Immigration Bill, Does so Himself

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
How many Islamic brothers have came to the USA looking for pressure cookers threw Mexico?
   Does Schumer care to report on that for us?


   In fact. How many Islamists were in Mexico waiting to move to the USA got Fast and Furious guns ...THEN came over to look for the pressure cookers?


   And of the brothers in Boston  I wonder if any of the guns THEY got were Fast and Furious guns!


   You Leftists have churned things into a nightmare!


    We need to stop this idiotic "immigration reform" from this Gang of 8. Who are they working for?

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
Excuse me Chuck, but I'm not getting a warm fuzzy feeling about Homeland Security at the moment.  Maybe it's all those front page photos of guys in black PJs carrying rifles and driving assault vehicles in downtown Boston.
I suppose you think the system worked, but we don't.
What was that line?  Don't pee on my leg and tell me it's raining.

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


Looking at Chucky's face reminds me of an Asshole. 

>>> END COMMENT <<<
